name: inlaid
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a decorative pattern put into a surface, or forming a pattern like this: inlaid with The top of the wooden chest was inlaid with ivory. locally crafted furniture of inlaid wood See
inlay
More examplesFewer examplesThese mosaics are art composed of small inlaid pieces of ceramic tile, glass, and stones to form a larger image.The inlaid marble floor was a marvel in itself.The lid bore a beautiful inlaid design of a rose.
